(Misc)/2019] Subject: Submission of Statement of Defence and Counter-claims before the Arbitral Tribunals on behalf of NHAI: Para 6.3 of the Policy Guidelines No. 2.1.22/2017 dated 01.06.2017 on Contractual Disputes/ Claims Standard Operating Procedure (SoP) for handling the Arbitration Cases & the Court Cases specify that the PD shall furnish   preliminary submissions, para-wise replies on the claims and details of counter-claims of NHAI to the Advocate/ Techno-Legal Expert engaged by NHAI. 2 It was observed that in some cases, PDs are not following above procedure and not handing over all the documents to Advocate/ Techno Legal Expert which led to weak technical/ contractual arguments and a weak case of NHAI before the Arbitral Tribunals. The Competent Authority has taken it very seriously and directed for strict compliance of above mentioned Policy Guidelines  Regional Officers and CGM(T), HQ shall also ensure compliance of the same: 3.
